oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A Guide to Community Action for Public School Integration
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Guide on public school integration to accompany a staff workshop at Highlander Folk School. The guide includes instruction on how local organizers can eliminate segregation in their communities. These steps include forming a committee, gathering facts, communication with the school board, and building public support.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Segregation in education; Civil rights; Civil rights movements; School integration; Political participation; Public schools; Segregation--Law and legislation; State boards of education; School boards; Citizens' advisory committees in education
